original_title: ‘Very productive,’ ‘constructive,’ ‘the best’: What leaders said about this week’s summits — RT Russia & Former Soviet Union
article_summary: Russia has returned the remains of 1,000 Ukrainian soldiers as part of the Istanbul agreements, following high-level summits discussing the Ukraine conflict between Russian President Vladimir Putin, US President Donald Trump, and Ukrainian President Vladimir Zelensky. The leaders expressed cautious optimism about the prospects of resolving the conflict.</s>
